scripts.gitinit: test -d .git && cd .git/hooks/ && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/commit-msg && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/prepare-commit-msg && chmod +x * || exit 0
scripts.prepare: npm run gitinit && npm run getjquery && npm run generateAssetsVersionFile
scripts.css:build:dev: lessc --source-map styles/critical.less styles/build/critical-$npm_package_version.css && lessc --source-map styles/lazy.less styles/build/lazy-$npm_package_version.css && for file in styles/routes/*.less; do lessc $file styles/build/`basename $file .less`-$npm_package_version.css ; done
scripts.css:build:prod: rm -rf styles/build/* && lessc styles/critical.less | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' | cssmin > styles/build/critical-$npm_package_version.css && lessc styles/lazy.less | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' | cssmin > styles/build/lazy-$npm_package_version.css && for file in styles/routes/*.less; do lessc $file styles/build/`basename $file .less`-$npm_package_version.css ; done
scripts.js:build: rm -rf scripts/build/ && npm run js:esmbuild && npm run js:iifebuild
scripts.compress: npm run compress:css && npm run compress:js && npm run compress:svg && npm run compress:img
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:compress
scripts.build: npm run css:build:prod && npm run js:build && npm run compress && npm run generateAssetsVersionFile
scripts.watch: npm run clean:all && livereload -w 1000 -ee 'less' -x 'css' & npm run css:watch & npm run js:watch
